Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of love it or hate it movie has ; It either will, you enjoy it for pure entertainment levels and what not.
